Class RiskMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.RiskMap

  • public class RiskMap
extends java.lang.Object
    RiskMap Class Loads the maps form the Console and from the file.
    Since:
    1.0

      • isMapConnected

        public boolean isMapConnected()
        Set the start node and end node of adjacent countries data structure to initiate the Breadth First Search
        Returns:
        if map is connected it returns true, else it returns false

        Returns:

      • breadthFirstSearch

        public boolean breadthFirstSearch(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> adjList,
                                  java.lang.String start,
                                  java.lang.String end)
        Traverses the countries with adjacent countries to check if all the nodes are connected
        Parameters:
        adjList - LinkedHashMap of countries and their adjacent countries
        start - First country in the list
        end - Last country in the list
        Returns:
        true if the algorithm is able to traverse from first to last node, else returns false
